scripts.generate: yarn proto:compile && yarn proto:generate-cjs && yarn proto:ts && yarn proto:copy-web && yarn proto:copy-cypress
scripts.proto:compile: rm -rf gen && mkdir gen && pbjs -t static-module -w es6 -o ./gen/healthPlanFormDataProto.js src/health_plan_form_data.proto
scripts.proto:generate-cjs: pbjs -t static-module -w commonjs -o ./gen/healthPlanFormDataProto.cjs src/health_plan_form_data.proto && cp ./gen/healthPlanFormDataProto.cjs ../app-api/src/gen/healthPlanFormDataProto.js && rm ./gen/healthPlanFormDataProto.cjs
